resources.string: Torres Hotel is 3 km from Torres Grande Beach. The establishment offers a pool with deck, games room, bar, restaurant and room service. For your convenience, free Wi-Fi and free parking are available. All bright rooms have simple d√©cor with tiled floors and a spacious wardrobe. Some have air conditioning, while others have a large LCD TV. All rooms have a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a daily breakfast buffet, which includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats. You can also enjoy regional specialties and a variety of drinks at the on-site restaurant. For your convenience, the property offers laundry facilities and a 24-hour front desk. Torres Hotel Portal is 1.5 km from bars, shops and restaurants in the center of Torres, and 200 km from Porto Alegre. We have 55 accommodations.
